segments.text: Hello ! How do I get online with my laptop ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just plug the Ethernet cable into your computer , and you'll be online in a heartbeat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I see the cable . But my computer runs on wireless only .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . I'll tell you about our alternatives .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I'd love to hear what the alternatives are .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our state-of-the-art computer lab is on the first floor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sir , the computers are free to guests , but you do have to pay a nominal printing fee .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You said there were other alternatives ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just use your computer here in the lobby . It's set up for wireless .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . That sounds like a winner . Now if I need to print something in the lobby ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We might have a printer here next month . But for now , you'll have to go to the lab .
segments.speaker: S2
